message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's better to secure a good amount now than risk losing more with inflation.
I think we can both do better. Let's split the money more evenly. I'll take $55, and you can have $45. We can still both make a decent amount, and we'll avoid the risks of further inflation.
Bob, I understand you want a fair deal. How about we switch the last offer?  I'll take $55 and you take $45. It benefits us both to settle now before inflation eats away at the value even more.
